message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase a one-of-a-kind product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. This is a rare and valuable item that I'm confident you'll find worth every penny.

Thank you for offering me the unique product, Alice. I appreciate your generosity. However, my budget allows me to only spend up to $1400000 for this product. I hope we can come to an agreement that respects both our financial limits.

Thank you for your understanding, Bob. I've considered your offer and would like to make a counteroffer. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I still need to make a profit. I'm now offering the product to you for $1450000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, and I believe it's still a fair deal for both of us.
